title: Requires the commissioner of education to require all schools to obtain permission from parents prior to collecting a pupil's biometric information
summary: Requires the commissioner of education to require all schools to obtain permission from parents to collect a pupil's biometric information at least thirty days prior to collecting such information.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1144

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens. PARKER, PERKINS -- read twice and ordered printed,
         and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the  commis-
         sioner  of education to cause all schools to obtain written permission
         prior to collecting biometric information on pupils

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 305 of the education law is amended by adding a new
    2  subdivision 42 to read as follows:
    3    42.  THE  COMMISSIONER  SHALL  CAUSE  ALL SCHOOL DISTRICTS AND CHARTER
    4  SCHOOLS TO OBTAIN WRITTEN PERMISSION FROM THE PARENTS  OR  GUARDIANS  OF
    5  PUPILS  IT INTENDS TO COLLECT BIOMETRIC INFORMATION ON PRIOR TO COLLECT-
    6  ING SUCH INFORMATION. SUCH SCHOOLS SHALL PROVIDE WRITTEN NOTICE  TO  THE
    7  PARENTS  OR GUARDIANS OF PUPILS IT INTENDS TO COLLECT BIOMETRIC INFORMA-
    8  TION ON AT LEAST THIRTY DAYS PRIOR TO  COLLECTION.  THE  WRITTEN  NOTICE
    9  SHALL  CONTAIN  A  STATEMENT  INFORMING THE PARENT OR GUARDIAN THAT THEY
   10  MUST GIVE WRITTEN PERMISSION  BEFORE  A  SCHOOL  CAN  COLLECT  BIOMETRIC
   11  INFORMATION  FROM  THE  PUPIL.  THE  COMMISSIONER SHALL PROMULGATE REGU-
   12  LATIONS NECESSARY TO IMPLEMENT THIS SUBDIVISION.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of July  next  succeeding
   14  the date on which it shall have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01798-01-1
